description: Grantwood Technology presents the SimpleSleeve for the Apple iPad and iPad 2 and iPad 3 and NEW iPad with Retina Display or 4th Generation (HD, including 4G LTE). This sleeve is made of extra durable neoprene and an asymmetric zipper. The zipper design allows easy insertion, removal and charging in the case. The inside of the case is made of a super soft, plush lining that will protect your iPad from unwanted wear and tear. The SimpleSleeve for iPad fits all Apple iPad models and was made specifically for the iPad (16GB, 32GB, 64GB Wi-Fi and WiFi + 3G + 4G LTE), works well with Apple Smart Cover. This sleeve is very light weight and is an excellent companion to use on its own, or in your favorite carrying casePlease see our other listings for SimpleSleeve for iPad in Blue/Black, and Purple/BlackWe stand by the our products and look forward to you becoming another happy customer.
title: SimpleSleeve, Premium Neoprene Sleeve for Apple iPad (all models, including new iPad Air), Black/Gray
